body.p:
Paris Mo Feby 10' 1862
Jas, W, Tate Esqr -- Asst secty State

Dr Sir,. Yours of the 24 inst is at hand, in which you inform ^me^ that by sending you Five Dollars you will renew my Commission as Commissioner of Deeds for Kentucky; which expires on the 20 Inst & After some reflection on the subject, and the difficulty of getting Money that would go with you I have concluded to renew my commission, and herewith enclose you a Five Dollar US Treasury note for that purpose Registered to your address -- You will please present me kindly to my old friend Governor MGoffin, and send me the commission with all necessary blanks and directions at an early day -- So that I may not be without authority to act should any business present its Self -- Since this unfortunate war however, business here, that is proffitable is much like angels visits -- few & far between, -- We hope for the better -- and think this game will Soon be plaid out --
Accept to yourself, renewed assurances of my high consideration and regard -- and believe me,

Truly your
Obt
Servt
Jno. W. McCann

Missouri
Comr. of Deeds
Paris
Jno W. McCann
Com. Issd Feby 18th 1862
